{{Infobox national military | name = Comorian Armed Forces | native_name = Armée nationale de développement | image = [[File:Seal of the Comoros.svg|180px]] | alt = | caption = Comorian Coat of Arms | image2 = | alt2 = | caption2 = | motto = | founded = | current_form = | disbanded = | branches = Comorian Army | headquarters = | flying_hours = | website = | commander-in-chief = [[Azali Assoumani]] | commander-in-chief_title = [[President of Comoros|Commander-in-chief]] | minister = | minister_title = Minister of Defense | commander = | commander_title = | age = | conscription = | manpower_data = | manpower_age = | available = | available_f = | fit = | fit_f = | reaching = | reaching_f = | active = | ranked = | reserve = | deployed = | amount = | percent_GDP = | domestic_suppliers = | foreign_suppliers = [[France]]
[[Russia]] | imports = | exports = | history = | ranks = [[Military ranks of Comoros]] }} The '''[[Comoros|Comorian]] Armed Forces''' ({{lang-fr|Armée nationale de développement}}) consist of a small standing army and a 500-member police force, as well as a 500-member defense force. A defense treaty with France provides naval resources for protection of territorial waters, training of Comorian military personnel, and air surveillance. [[France]] maintains a small troop presence in the Comoros at government request. France maintains a small maritime base and a [[French Foreign Legion|Foreign Legion]] Detachment (DLEM) on [[Mayotte]]. == Equipment inventory == * [[FN FAL]] Battle Rifle * [[AK-47]] Assault Rifle * [[Type 81 Assault Rifle]]{{cite web|author= |url=http://bbs.tiexue.net/post2_5181791_1.html |title=[原创]久经考验的好枪！81式枪族在海外[已拜读]|website=tiexue.net |date= |accessdate=2016-10-19}} * [[NSV (machine gun)|NSV]] HMG * [[RPG-7]] Anti-Tank Weapon * [[Mitsubishi L200]] Pickup Trucks [[File:Hand-to-hand combat skills of the Comoran Army.jpg|thumb|Comoran Defense Force soldiers show off hand-to-hand combat skills]] ==Aircraft== {| class="wikitable" !
